content: Have some accounts to sell binance, revolut, kucoin, bybit,akt..Telegram: @Brunosatoss

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: You want to sell accounts that can be created freely without any money in just few minutes unless your country is restricted from accessing the exchange sites. If your country is restricted, you should use another exchange instead or the one supported in your country rather than buying an account that if noticed it is bought, would be banned.

comments.author: albon
comments.created_time: December 03, 2022, 06:34:42 PMLast edit: December 03, 2022, 07:24:59 PM by albon
comments.body: Quote from: Statuson on December 03, 2022, 05:51:20 PMHave some accounts to sell binance, revolut, kucoin, bybit,akt..Telegram: @BrunosatossCreating an account on these platforms that you mentioned is free, man, or do you want to buy a verified account that has passed the KYC? This is not a legitimate way and I do not advise anyone to sell you their account on these exchanges, and even if you get the account from someone your IP will be different from the seller’s country, and the account will be banned by the exchanges and your money will be frozen. You must withdraw from the idea of ​​purchase and do not use a VPN and abide by the policies and conditions of the exchanges, or you can trade on another platform available in your country or without KYC.
